attributes.action: Retain the figure of Britannia on the 50 pence coin contrary to the Governments plans to replace it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The figure of Britannia on the 50 pence coin is a national patriotic symbol and should be retained, contrary to the Government's recent plans to replace it with an alternative design, which would be another nail in the coffin of British  traditions.

rejection.details: There is already a petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Leaving-the-EU/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
